1.name: Diary
1.description: Each time a Hero plays an Ally, that Hero loses 1 ❤️.
1.reward: If you play two or more Allies, any one Hero gains 2 ❤️.

2.name: Ring
2.description: Whenever a Hero assigns 2 or more ⚡ to a Villain, that Hero loses 2 ❤️.
2.reward:
Once per turn, you may discard two cards.
If you do, remove 1 🛑 from the Location.

3.name: Locket
3.description: Heroes cannot gain ⚡ or 🪙 on other Heroes' turns.
3.reward:
Once per turn, you may discard a card.
If you do, roll the 🟩 Die.

4.name: Cup
4.description: At the start of each turn, remove 1 ⚡ from all Villains.
4.reward:
Once per turn, you may discard a card.
If you do, roll the 🟨 Die.

5.name: Diadem
5.description: At the start of each turn, if the Active Hero has at least one Ally, Item and Spell in hand, that Hero loses 2 ❤️.
5.reward:
Once per turn, you may discard a card.
If you do, roll the 🟦 Die.

6.name: Nagini
6.description: At the start of each turn, Active Heroe loses 1 ❤️ and cannot gain ❤️ this turn.
6.reward: Once per game, you may discard this to remove 3 🛑 from the Location.
